channel.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
channel.description:
The Scout
Blue Dragon Investigative
Unique
Passive- Faster than a speeding bullet
immune to death at night once
Night ability 1- Recon see what classes visit your target infinite uses you will be told that an nk visited your target but not which one
Night ability 2- Watchful Eye see what class your target visits 2 uses Neutral killers are immune to this
The Vangaurd
Unseen Investigative
Passive Faster than a speeding bullet
immune to death at night once
Night ability 1- Patrol see who visits the unseen tonight you will be told which classes visit which members infinite uses
Night ability 2- look ahead if the assassin targets someone guarded by a knight a hunter who is bearing or a night immune target they will not attack them 3 uses (basically give the assassin the sorcs perception tonight)
to O.P. Too U.P.? thell me what you think

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
Good idea

For nk it just shows up as nk

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Also instead of exact class you should have him see faction and type

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Scl007:

Night ability 2- Watchful Eye see what class your target visits 2 uses Neutral killers are immune to this

So what happens if you target a neutral killer?

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I don’t think we need more immune targets either though

This would just be incredibly frustrating to play against

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
Just a fun idea idk we don’t need more occ immune targets

Read full topic

Passive- Faster than a speeding bullet

immune to death at night once

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I think that Recon is unfortunately an overpowered version of Gossip. I would like a new BD investigative class that would be easy to fake claim though.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
Definitely doesn’t need the death immunity, also the mastermind should be immune to this or come up as the ‘sheriff’

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
k I shall change it a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
The vanguard is definitely good for an unseen class, however, the BD version probably shouldn’t be able to see scorned visits and NK visits.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
main reason I made it unique

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea Scout/Vangaurd
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
I like both the ideas tbh. However, could be a bit too OP
